az: men u shouldnt listen 2 your selfish heart it doesnt really have a brain besides keeping u alive its existence is in vain how could i be so mean and say your heart has no place because mortal men fall in love again as fast as they changed their face i may be cruel but think awhile about the hearts that u have broken match that with the empty vows and broken promises uve spoken i am not saying females r perfect because men we know its not true but why must u be unfaithful if her heart is true 2 u  -shakur
